issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Fix unity build error in Flight SQL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix an error in the unity build (arrow::Result instead of Result which gets resolved to flight::Result)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15198?focusedCommentId=17464761) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12013
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12013>
